answer: <p>The <code>');</code> ends the query, it doesn't start a comment. Then it drops the students table and comments the rest of the query that was supposed to be executed.</p>
<p>The <code>'</code> character in SQL is used  for string constants. In this case it is used for ending the string constant and not for comment.</p>
